title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1505.2 - Terminus of fire escapes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1505.2 - Terminus of fire escapes

State Regulations

All required fire escapes shall lead to the street, or to a
yard, court, area or passageway affording continuous, safe and unobstructed
access to a street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1505.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
